medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms included a 3-week history of mild pain in the shoulder and left side of the neck that began at work, a 2-month history of muscle pain in the left leg after a sports injury, listlessness, and a 3-month history of increasing frequency of urination occurring up to twice each night and every 3 hours during the day, managed by fluid restriction. Neck pain partially decreased with naproxen, acetaminophen, and cyclobenzaprine.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, benign prostatic hypertrophy, diverticulitis, lumbar disk disease, colonic polyps, ischial bursitis, chronic dyspepsia, nocturnal leg cramps, excessive alcohol use (stopped 4 years earlier), osteoarthritis of the shoulders, knees, and hips.
medical_history.family_history: Father and grandfather died of lung cancer, grandmother died of a stroke, mother died of liver disease, uncle had pancreatic cancer.
medical_history.social_history: Patient does not smoke or use illicit drugs, lives with wife, has adult children, works in an office, and had stopped drinking alcohol 4 years prior.
